name: Lone Survivor (itch) (Venneth)
description:
A mage, an axeman, an archer, a warrior, and a shieldmen embark on a quest, while camping in a forest one night, they were attacked! Can they survive the night?

Concept: If a party member dies, the rest of the alive members gets a specific boost depending on who died.

Lone Survivor is a game made for the 3rd BTP Game Jam, and being my first actually finished game ever in my experience of doing casual game developing for around a year.

TUTORIAL:

Attack using the left mouse button( The tutorial i wrote said that you use right mouse button this is wrong ,i did not know why did i write right mouse button and why did i didn't realize it untill now)

The campfire heals you if you move near it, take advantage of it the best of you can.
